Title: Establishes a new assault crime for an assault on a retired police officer who previously arrested the assailant
Summary: Establishes a new assault crime for an assault on a retired police officer who previously arrested the assailant; establishes that assaulting such a retired police officer with intent to seek retribution is assault in the first degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to assaulting a retired police officer
